name: rio-api
description: RAIO API that uses NodeJS, ExpressJS and MongoDB

scripts.start: yarn; yarn run client-install; yarn run client-build; node -r dotenv/config server.js
scripts.dev-local-api: secretOrKey='secret' siteURL='http://localhost:5000/' SMTP_HOST='mail.raio.agency' SMTP_PORT=465 SMTP_PWD='Raio123!@#' SMTP_USER='admin@raio.agency' mongoURI='mongodb://localhost:27017/rio?authSource=admin' NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn run server"
scripts.dev-local: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev-local-api" "yarn run client"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn run server" "yarn run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false yarn --cwd client && yarn --cwd client run build

author: Raio Plataforma
